email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider a rate in the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the demurrage terms? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer a revised rate of $51.00 per metric ton, which is competitive given the current market. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Can you confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October and provide the full charter party agreement for review? Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. Yes, the laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Let me know if there are any additional details you need. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the prompt follow-up. We’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks in order. Let’s proceed with the booking. Please confirm the final details. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent news! The booking is confirmed. The MV Ocean Star will load crude oil in Houston on 15 October, with discharge in Rotterdam. The agreed freight rate is $51.00 per metric ton, and demurrage is $25,000 per day. I’ll send the final confirmation shortly. Thanks for your business, Sarah.
